name: Paganitzu
description: Journey into an Aztec pyramid and survive the adventure of a lifetime! No other game forces you to die in order to complete it! That's just one of many incredible plot twists in this excellent puzzle-oriented arcade-adventure game. Guide Alabama Smith (Al) into a vast and dangerous Aztec pyramid.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 8 Processor: Intel Core Due 2 Memory: 2 GB RAM

reviews.review_text: I legitimately had fun with this in spite of the fact I didn't have it way back when.

Did not like this that much. Guess i can't hate on it TOO much though since it's from 91 but i mean still, ive had text based games that were more thrilling. Just know that this game is exactly what it looks like with no challenge.
